FairPrice is a well-known supermarket chain in Singapore that offers a wide range of products at affordable prices. The store is clean, well-organized, and easy to navigate, making shopping a pleasant experience. The staff are friendly and helpful, providing excellent customer service. FairPrice also offers a variety of promotions and discounts, allowing customers to save money on their purchases. Overall, FairPrice is a reliable and convenient option for grocery shopping in Singapore.

In Pasir Ris, this is one of my favourite supermarket to shop for my weekly groceries, especially for sauces and herbs. They do have a lot of choices. üòç
I love that after they have expanded, it was spacious, and items here are categorised very well,
easy to find, and shelves are neat. üëç

Cashiers/staffs are friendly and helpful too! üëç üëç

This fair price has discounts going on. Not that large for a store but it has almost all of the basic needs we would get for daily life. Items stocked up quite fast for this store unless items are out of stock

FairPrice e! Hub Downtown East
Sometimes a bit expensive, however they have good quality products and varities groceries.
One of the larger Supermarket around the east area.
If you looking for a place with good variety of groceries, this is the place. They have fish, meat, fruits and vegetables.
